error.outside-range: Can't interact with dates outside the range April 20, 271821 BC to Sep 13, 275760 AD.

invalid-time.title: Invalid time
invalid-time.message: Error trying to set time to an invalid date

error.invalid-date: New date is outside range (April 20, 271821 BC, Sep 13, 275760 AD)
error.invalid-year: Year '{{value}}' is outside allowed year range (April 20, 271821 BC, Sep 13, 275760 AD)

lock-time.tooltip: Lock time updates to prevent automatic changes. Use 'Interpolate' or 'Set' to manually apply the selected date and time.

aria-label.locked: Set date-time input mode to 'locked' mode
aria-label.unlocked: Set date-time input mode to 'unlocked' mode
